29061190301859231392.NAME: Conjuration expert? OF COURSE I'm an expert, idiot. I'm a mage-lord. But you think I'm sending ghosts to haunt the Gateway Inn? Get OUT of here, you fool!

104471798161766259.NAME: A mage skilled at Conjuration is adept at summoning otherworldly creatures, including ghosts.

102361280251481491.NAME: Hmm. Conjuration expert? Here? In Sadrith Mora? Well, my first thought would be Master Neloth, the mage-lord of Tel Naga. He's a mickle wizard. But Conjuration is not his specialty. In fact, I don't know anyone in Sadrith Mora who TEACHES Conjuration. No. Wait. Uleni Heleran at the Mages Guild at Wolverine Hall teaches Conjuration. I'm sure of it.
102361280251481491.BNAM:
;Sadrith Mora; witchhunter; Journal "town_Sadrith" >= 10; Journal "town_Sadrith" < 50;
Journal town_sadrith_expert 1
